title: Spread the Word About Diabetes Awareness
subtitle: November is Diabetes Awareness Month. Help raise awareness about the physical and mental challenges of diabetes. Together, let’s create healthier, more compassionate workplaces — because awareness can save lives.
sectionTitle: 10 Ways to Do More for Diabetes at Work
facts: 7 in 10 people living with diabetes are of working age.
Encourage healthy meal options in the workplace.
Organize an annual wellness screening for your team.
Share educational materials about diabetes prevention.
Support flexible schedules for medical appointments.
Promote walking or standing meetings to stay active.
Celebrate World Diabetes Day with a team activity.
Offer wellness incentives for healthier lifestyle habits.
Share resources for mental health and stress management.
Encourage regular health checkups and awareness talks.
